Articles.Content: Is there any news?
No, not really, I moved now from modelling to texturing, that's basically all. CBC is mostly done, but I won't show any pictures until I am sure everything will work and look like as I want ito

No, not really, I moved now from modelling to texturing, that's basically all. CBC is mostly done, but I won't show any pictures until I am sure everything will work and look like as I want ito

Ok:) We want done mod more than pics:)
How is going your work on Delta?

Oh, you really want a download now right? Texturing is done except the Fairings, then I will refine everything to get a nice, balanced Delta for Stock KSP and then I will configurate everything to work nicely with Real Solar System. And then lots of testing. That's the plan.

Oh, you really want a download now right? Texturing is done except the Fairings, then I will refine everything to get a nice, balanced Delta for Stock KSP and then I will configurate everything to work nicely with Real Solar System. And then lots of testing. That's the plan.

No, i want to know that mod isn't abandoned. Will be available version for Vanilla KSP or only for RSS? But if you need testers, i'd be happy to help:)
It will be avaible for Vanilla and RSS;) Currently I have Dragon01, and he does a great job as tester, but I will keep it in mind.
Ah, ok. I just can't wait this mod to be released:)

http://i.imgur.com/YJOvngN.jpg

Things are coming up nicely, the textures need a small tweak here and there, but otherwise, it is ready for testing. Features own FX and Sounds, extendable nozzle on DCSS and more!

Note: This is still WIP, things may change!

http://i.imgur.com/YJOvngN.jpg

Things are coming up nicely, the textures need a small tweak here and there, but otherwise, it is ready for testing. Features own FX and Sounds, extendable nozzle on DCSS and more!

Note: This is still WIP, things may change!

It looks very beautiful, you're doing good job! Maybe, will need more different payload fairings.

Edited November 3, 2014 by crberus
How it's going? How soon will be ready Vanilla-version?

Please don't ask every 4 days, a mod or a rocket can't be made in a week. I won't talk about a release yet, because I don't know, and I can't say how fast I will get everything working. Also, there are still a couple of parts which needs to be done, for example the 5m DCSS, Nosecones, 5m Fairings and some other things. Right now, the Delta IV Medium is completed, after several fixes on DCSS and Interstage. I'm now working on GEM-60 SRM's, and I will release the full Delta IV Package once II'm done with all needed parts and testing. As soon as there's anything interesting I will write it here.

Please don't ask every 4 days, a mod or a rocket can't be made in a week. I won't talk about a release yet, because I don't know, and I can't say how fast I will get everything working. Also, there are still a couple of parts which needs to be done, for example the 5m DCSS, Nosecones, 5m Fairings and some other things. Right now, the Delta IV Medium is completed, after several fixes on DCSS and Interstage. I'm now working on GEM-60 SRM's, and I will release the full Delta IV Package once II'm done with all needed parts and testing. As soon as there's anything interesting I will write it here.

Ah, ok. I'm sorry for my raring.

Don't forget to send it over for testing. I don't have much time right now, but maybe I'll manage to take a look at what you have.

Also, this needs some higher detail textures, particularly on the insulation foam, engines and the second stage LOX tank. It seems that the current textures are pretty simple, as far as they go.

Edited November 7, 2014 by Guest

Hi, here are renders of the Delta II model:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Hope you like it!

YANFRET is currently working on better textures for the Delta IV.
Wait, so the Delta IV family is basically ready for release, except that it needs to have YANFRET's textures installed?

Wait, so the Delta IV family is basically ready for release, except that it needs to have YANFRET's textures installed?

Yeah, basically. But I still have to improve DCSS 5m Upper Stage model, it doen't really look like I want. Also, I want to include the Delta II in the next version, so this may take some time.

Let's not engage in too much feature creep, though. We've already got Delta IV and III, unless you want to rework the III's first stage and boosters to the new standard, that is. That's enough for a test release, at least. Unless Delta II can be finished quickly, I'd release it later.

Also, I just remembered that to complete the "Delta II" lineup, you should also have the Delta 6000 (besides what I mentioned on PM). This means smaller boosters (Castor 4A) and an RS-27 engine (shorter nozzle than on RS-27A, otherwise identical).
OMG, it looks very well, just can't wait to play with it!
Please, tell that it's still active
It is, Yanfret is now looking at Delta II and we've got IV nearly done. Texturing is taking time and effort, but we want this to be a top-quality pack, so it'll be worth the wait, I think.
cannot wait for release!. I'm glad your getting your foot into the door of modding after helping me finish up the Antares pack.

Thanks DartVader!

So, we had tweaked our plan a bit, the next update will only contain the Delta II family, we will release Delta III and IV later, because when we'll release the II earlier, you guys can play with it while we finish III and IV . Delta IV really needs some polishing...

Anyway, here are 4 pictures of the Delta K upper stages. I'll have to tweak the length of the engine a bit, but that will be easily made in Unity. The (amazing) Textures you can see here are made by the fantastic YANFRET! Also a big thanks to Dragon01, for his support he offered while developing those things. We hope you'll like it!

Javascript is disabled. View full album
I love the way it looks. We really need the Delta II for launching Raidernick's US probes, so it's great that it's looking this good. Can't wait to see the rest of it.
Sorry for the unrelated post, but could you delete some PMs Dragon?
